channel.title: Magical Glitch? lol
channel.description:
ok when u barrage a big monster, for example Kalphite Queen or KBD or Jad, the barrage shows up on a weird square around it instead of on it, any1 no the fix 2 it? :)
rep++ 2 helpers perhaps? ;) ;)

item.title: Magical Glitch? lol
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

stillgfx(barragegfxID, EnemyY + 2, EnemyX + 2);

That will make it work on big monsters which take up about 4-6 squares, although it will look retarded on smaller NPC’s which take up about 1 square.

Read full topic

item.title: Magical Glitch? lol
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); setAnimation(1979); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle(); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[6]), 6); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); //sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); stillgfx(369, EnemyY, EnemyX); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }
Try now.
By the way, that’s for NPC.

Read full topic

item.title: Magical Glitch? lol
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Here. Try these
Barrage code for NPC

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); setAnimation(1979); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle(); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[6]), 6); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); //sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

Barrage code for Pvp

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > 93) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 4 "+getItemName(560)+", 6 "+getItemName(555)+" and 2 "+getItemName(565)); } if(playerBonus[3] <= 40) { castOnPlayer.playerGfx(85,10); sendMessage("You need mage robes for magic!."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)&& (playerBonus[3] >= 20)) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 30, 1); barrageMultiFreeze = false; addSkillXP((300+playerLevel[6]), 6); addSkillXP((150 + playerLevel[3]), 3); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

Not much different, but worth a try

Read full topic

item.title: Magical Glitch? lol
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

its just the basic czar with my magic bonus n stuff lol

npc barrage code:

if (magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == false)) { sendMessage( "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); setAnimation(1979); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].PoisonPlayer(); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle(); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; addSkillXP((800 * playerLevel[6]), 6); // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); // sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff; } } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage( "You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

pvp barage code:

if (spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if (playerLevel[6] > 93) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == false)) { sendMessage( "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage( "You need 4 " + getItemName(560) + ", 2 " + getItemName(565) + " and 6 " + getItemName(555)); } if(mageSplash <= 35) { castOnPlayer.playerGfx(85,10); startAnimation(1979); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == true) && (playerBonus[3] >= 30)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 17, 1); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); //PkingDelay = 1; //actionTimer = 2; stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); // stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); // castOnPlayer.stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

Read full topic
